Author: msnwla
Text: honestly, my body dysmorphia is pretty bad so unfortunately that’s not super useful for me /: i always feel kinda gross. although i do find that dysmorphia gets worse the more weight i lose bc of feeling ‘ghost fat’, as my psychiatrist explained to me. anyways, thanks for the advice!

Author: -Macaronis-
Text: Do you like how you look? I try to concentrate on my appearance. I do think that I look better at a healthy weight but damn the moment I step on a scale I want to rip my skin off. But if your body dysmorphia is bad af it won't help at all, I guess :/ mine acts up sometimes and it is the worst thing that can happen in recovery, imo. Makes me want to go to my old shit.
